column4: is there a way to make a boot CD that'll boot into linux that's on hdb even if hda's mbr doesnt have a linux loader?
Amaranth that's not what i asked mate. i have winxp on hda and hoary on hdb. i dont want grub on hda's mbr , i just want to create a CD that'll boot into hdb ignoring hda

Amaranth winxp keeps corrupting grub turning the system unbootable. tried every possible way to do this but no go , winxp keeps fucking grub up so i figured i'll just boot into linux from a CD and get it over with
